intro: Be ready for anything, because the battle’s just beginning!
description:
In this exciting 3D action game, you play as a brave squirrel who discovers a magical acorn and plants it right in the middle of a city street. From the acorn grows a mighty enchanted tree — a symbol of hope, nature, and home. But not everyone is happy about it: animal control squads, city maintenance crews, and urban greenery services have decided the tree is a threat to order... and now they want to cut it down.
You are the only thing standing between this magical tree and merciless saws. Arm yourself — from nut blasters to pinecone crossbows — and defend your green home from wave after wave of incoming enemies!

Game Features:
• 50 levels of intense action – each wave of enemies grows stronger, faster, and more dangerous.
 • 6 unique weapons – each with its own playstyle and special upgrades.
• Heal yourself and restore the tree between waves to keep the fight going.
• Diverse enemies – from pest control squads to advanced tree-cutting machines.
• Atmospheric locations – battle in detailed city streets, urban parks, and more.
• Your mission: survive as long as possible, repel all enemy forces, and save the magic tree from destruction!

Survive as long as possible, fight off all enemy waves, and save your magical tree from destruction.
